nodes.excerpt: React Native ARIA provides a set of React hooks that handles behaviour, accessibility and interactions so you can implement custom components and design systems for Android, iOS and Web.
nodes.title: React Native ARIA - React Hooks to make accessible React Native design systems
nodes.author: Gaurav Guha

localize.description: React Native ARIA提供了一套处理行为、可访问性和交互的React钩子，因此你可以为Android、iOS和Web实现自定义组件和设计系统。
localize.tagline: React Hooks让React Native设计系统无障碍化

localize.description: React Native ARIA提供了一套處理行爲、可訪問性和交互的React鉤子，因此你可以爲Android、iOS和Web實現自定義組件和設計系統。
localize.tagline: React Hooks讓React Native設計系統無障礙化

nodes.excerpt: Are you a start up or a solo founder? don't have much funds to hire an animator/video editor to show case your product? worry not! videofork.co is here for you!! A free web based animation tool to create explainer videos for your startup/side project.
nodes.title: Videofork.co - Create explainer videos & GIFs for your startup for free
nodes.author: Jaga Deep

localize.description: 你是一个初创公司或一个单独的创始人吗？ 没有太多的资金来聘请一个动画师/视频编辑来展示你的产品？ 不用担心！Videofork.co在这里为你服务！。一个免费的基于网络的动画工具，为你的创业公司/副业项目创建解释视频。
localize.tagline: 免费为您的创业公司创建解释视频和GIFs

localize.description: 你是一個初創公司或一個單獨的創始人嗎？ 沒有太多的資金來聘請一個動畫師/視頻編輯來展示你的產品？ 不用擔心！Videofork.co在這裏爲你服務！。一個免費的基於網絡的動畫工具，爲你的創業公司/副業項目創建解釋視頻。
localize.tagline: 免費爲您的創業公司創建解釋視頻和GIFs

nodes.excerpt: doodad.dev is a site for tools to make the internet faster, more accessible, and more expressive. The pattern generator helps you make seamless, unique, royalty-free patterns. You can export as SVG, JPEG, or PNG. It's free forever, no tracking, etc. Enjoy!
nodes.title: Doodad Pattern Generator - Create unique, seamless, royalty-free patterns
nodes.author: Nathaniel

localize.description: doodad.dev是一个让互联网更快、更方便、更有表现力的工具网站。图案生成器可以帮助你制作无缝、独特、免版税的图案。你可以导出为SVG、JPEG或PNG格式。它永远免费，没有跟踪等。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 创建独特、无缝、免版税的图案

localize.description: doodad.dev是一個讓互聯網更快、更方便、更有表現力的工具網站。圖案生成器可以幫助你製作無縫、獨特、免版稅的圖案。你可以導出爲SVG、JPEG或PNG格式。它永遠免費，沒有跟蹤等。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 創建獨特、無縫、免版稅的圖案

nodes.title: The CEO known for increasing his employees’ base annual pay to $70,000 says wealthy people donating and getting rewarded with “glowing articles, a hospital named after you and a massive tax write-off” amount to “one of capitalism’s biggest PR scams.” https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc

nodes.excerpt: We can not share links when we are speaking in podcasts or clubhouse rooms. Hupu, creates numbers for your links and people who wants to reach, enter number to hupu app or webpage and reach links without sign-in.

nodes.author: Bahadır Kaya

localize.tagline: 通过数字与您的受众分享链接

localize.description: 我們在播客或會所房間發言時，不能分享鏈接。Hupu，爲你的鏈接和想聯繫的人創建號碼，輸入號碼到hupu應用或網頁，無需登錄就能聯繫到鏈接。
localize.tagline: 通過數字與您的受衆分享鏈接

nodes.excerpt: Postmodern is a mobile app designed for ephemeral, one-on-one, anonymous conversations. Whether we seek to explore our own minds, or the structures of our society, we need communication tools that allow us to peel away the pollutants to our thought.
nodes.title: Postmodern. - Short, anonymous conversations with strangers.
nodes.author: Nathaniel

localize.description: 后现代是一款为短暂的、一对一的、匿名对话而设计的手机应用。无论我们是想探索自己的思想，还是探索社会的结构，我们都需要沟通工具，让我们剥离思想的污染物。
localize.tagline: 与陌生人进行简短的、匿名的对话。

localize.description: 後現代是一款爲短暫的、一對一的、匿名對話而設計的手機應用。無論我們是想探索自己的思想，還是探索社會的結構，我們都需要溝通工具，讓我們剝離思想的污染物。
localize.tagline: 與陌生人進行簡短的、匿名的對話。

nodes.excerpt: Quill is the best way to message with a team or group. Built for productivity and focus, Quill reduces notifications, collects conversations into threads, and gets out of your way — so you can get back to doing what you do best.

nodes.author: Jordan Borth

localize.description: Quill是与团队或小组进行信息交流的最佳方式。Quill 专为提高工作效率和专注度而设计，它可以减少通知，将对话收集到线程中，并让您不再碍事，这样您就可以回到您最擅长的工作中去。
localize.tagline: 信息传递让你的团队变得更好

nodes.excerpt: Buffelist is a URL listing platform to reach high-quality content on the internet by letting people reach other's content suggestions. You can also share your content suggestions by creating your list. Briefly, Buffelist is a social bookmarking platform.
nodes.title: Buffelist - Content link listing platform to share useful content links
nodes.author: Bekir

localize.description: Buffelist是一个URL列表平台，通过让人们达到别人的内容建议，来达到互联网上的优质内容。你也可以通过创建你的列表来分享你的内容建议。简单来说，Buffelist是一个社交书签平台。
localize.tagline: 内容链接列表平台，分享有用的内容链接

localize.description: Buffelist是一個URL列表平臺，通過讓人們達到別人的內容建議，來達到互聯網上的優質內容。你也可以通過創建你的列表來分享你的內容建議。簡單來說，Buffelist是一個社交書籤平臺。
localize.tagline: 內容鏈接列表平臺，分享有用的內容鏈接
